item.title: How to Beat Analysts and the Stock Market with Machine Learning
item.description: Corporate profitability is crucial signal for investment and business valuation as they are a key indicator of a company’s success and the development of its equity. Here, we present a machine learning method for Bank’s Net Interest Income (NII) nowcasting based on completely publicly available data that can outperform human analysts. Nowcasting is a reasonably new word; at least in economic finance. It is either the opposite of forecasting or simply a pun on the word ‘forecasting’.
